leoLabel.name: warningText
leoLabel.text: Warning If you proceed to the next step you will not be able to return. Would you like to continue?

leoLabel.name: step1Label
leoLabel.text: STEP 1 Create the shape of your vase by twisting the sliders below

leoLabel.name: step2Label
leoLabel.text: STEP 2 Twist the shape of the top and the torso

leoLabel.name: step3Label
leoLabel.text: STEP 3 Color your vase and make it personal by engraving onto it

leoButton.name: zoomNavigationButton
leoButton.tooltip: Scroll the mouse wheel to zoom in/out

leoButton.name: panNavigationButton
leoButton.tooltip: Pan the camera with the right mouse button

leoButton.name: rotateNavigationButton
leoButton.tooltip: Rotate the object with the left mouse button
